text: Hello! How are you today?
I am good. How are you?
Doing great thanks.  Have you heard of a charity called Save the Children?
No, I have not. What do they do?
Save the Children is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.
I was hoping you would say that the help our children right here in American. We never seem to have any that think about our children.
That is very true.  This organization is great. Making a donation is essential to help ensuring children's rights to health, education, safety, etc.
It is great that they want o help children all over the world, but I am looking for something that helps our children.
International is helping children all over the world.  This isn't just for one specific location.
But does it say it helps children in America also. Most times an international charity doesn't help right here in America.
Please feel free to check out their website.  It will help you gather a lot more information if you like.   URL
I just did a quick look and the first thing I see is that it is still on the ground in Texas after Hurricane Harvey. So that is great to see that means they do care about our children.

Yes, its wonderful that such an organization cares about all the children all over the world. Taking care of children is one of my passions.  I have 4 extra that I care for in my home.  Would you be willing to make a donation today from the payment of this task today?
I don't know. It seems like a great charity, but I do have to think about my own children and if I donate the money I'm making then it means I'm taking something away from them
Even just a few cents today will go along way for those children.
If it is coming from my payment today it is something that I don't have yet...so maybe I can do 0.20.
That would be a huge help.  Thank you so much for your contribution.
Your very welcome....I"m glad I could help even if it is so little
The world needs a better place for our children.  We don't realize how so little goes a long way when a child goes without.
Yes, we do need to make this place better for our children they are our future
